titles.title: How Lovely On The Mountains Are The Feet Of Him

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
How lovely on the mountains are the feet of Him,
Who brings good news, good news.
Announcing peace, proclaiming news of happiness.
Our God reigns, our God reigns.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Our God reigns, our God reigns.
Our God reigns, our God reigns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ye watchmen lift your voices joyfully as one.
Shout for your King, your King.
See eye to eye your Lord restoring Zion.
Your God reigns, your God reigns.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Our God reigns, our God reigns.
Our God reigns, our God reigns.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Waste places of Jerusalem, break forth with joy
We are redeemed, redeemed.
The Lord has saved and comforted His people.
Your God reigns, your God reigns.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Our God reigns, our God reigns.
Our God reigns, our God reigns.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
End of the earth, see the salvation of the risen Lord.
Jesus is Lord, is Lord.
Before the nations He has bared His holy arm.
Your God reigns, your God reigns.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Our God reigns, our God reigns.
Our God reigns, our God reigns.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Out from the tomb He came with grace and majesty
He is alive, He is alive
God loves us so; see here his hands, his feet, his side.
Yes, we know, He is alive.

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
He is alive, He is alive.
He is alive, He is alive.

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
Cuan hermosos los pies del que trae nuevas,
Nuevas del bien, del bien.
Anuncian paz, publican salvacion.
Reina mi Dios. (2x)
